author: khaosmos93
body:
#### PR description:
This PR adds the following modules:
- a new L2 muon seed generator from L1TkMuon
- a new L3 muon filter with L1TkMuon
- a new dR filter for MuonRef of L1TkMuon

N.B. To compile it, #32571 should be merged prior to this PR

#### PR validation:
matrix tests (after merging #32571)
title: New producers and filters for the Phase 2 Muon HLT
